_sText:
surf_this_njv (no jail version)

This version is made for surf timer and other similar addons. I will most likely make a jail and release a combat version. All the teleports in the map lead back to spawn. I left them in the map so people would see where they will be in the combat version. The map doesnt have a timer. Since this is all about the surf, I deleted all the details so that fps would be as high as possible. I have about 200-300 all through the map. 

Comments/Critique concerning the surf is most welcome, but as I said, I'm well aware that details and jail are missing. 

Settings should be:
-tickrate 66
sv_airaccelerate 150
sv_gravity 800

<object width="560" height="340"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/UIUFZkwcXzI&hl=en_US&fs=1&"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/UIUFZkwcXzI&hl=en_US&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="280" height="170"></embed></object>

Thanks to the betatesters.
I hope you like the map.

Cheers,
Brave.
